name: Flicker (itch) (Rowana)
description:
Flicker is a fun and cute game where you have to dodge droplets of water falling from the sky! Collect hearts and power-ups to get the best score possible. This is my first video game, so please leave a comment on your thoughts, thanks! Flicker was made with the help of a Udemy course using the Unity game engine: 

https://www.udemy.com/course/make-your-first-2d-game-with-unity-c-beginner-cours...
